text: Oswaldo Vigas (4 August 1926 - 22 April 2014) was a Venezuelan painter and muralist. His work was in the form of Cubism. He was best known for winning the National Prize of Plastic Arts of Venezuela in 1952. He was born in Valencia, Carabobo. Vigas died on 22 April 2014 in Caracas, aged 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Venezuelan painters Category:Carabobo Category:20th-century painters Category:21st-century painters
title: Oswaldo Vigas
